info.title: MCP API
info.description:
Search, check availability, and purchase traditional DNS domains. This API enables AI assistants to help users find and buy domain names.

When using the API directly, you will need an API key. See [API Key setup](/mcp/overview#api-key-advanced) for instructions.

post.summary: Search for available domains or check specific domain availability
post.description: Search for domain availability and pricing. Can check a specific domain (e.g., "example.com") or search terms across multiple TLDs. Supports multiple queries in a single request for efficient batch lookups. Returns a list of matching domains with their availability status, prices, and other details. IMPORTANT: Not all ICANN TLDs are supported. Use ud_tld_list to verify TLD support before searching with specific TLDs.

query.description: Domain name(s) to search - can be a full domain name like "example.com" (TLD is inferred) or a search term like "mybusiness" (searches across TLDs). Supports array of up to 10 terms for batch operations.

tlds.description: Optional list of up to 5 ICANN TLDs to search (e.g., ["com", "org", "io"]). Must be supported TLDs - use ud_tld_list to verify. Defaults to popular TLDs (com, net, org, ai, io) or inferred from query.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100, default: 20)

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination (default: 0)

post.description: List all available ICANN TLDs (top-level domains) supported by our registrar.

List domains in the authenticated user's portfolio with filtering, sorting, and pagination. By default, only ICANN (DNS) domains are returned. Returns 50 domains per page by default. If hasMore is true in the pagination response, increment the page parameter to fetch additional results.

searchTerm.description: Optional search term to filter domains by name

registryType.description: Filter by registry type: "dns" (ICANN/Web2 domains, default) or "web3" (blockchain domains only)

expiringWithinDays.description: Filter domains expiring within the specified number of days (1-365)

expired.description: Filter for domains that have already expired

minLength.description: Filter domains with label length >= this value

maxLength.description: Filter domains with label length <= this value

post.description: Get comprehensive information for specific domains in your portfolio. Returns all data from ud_portfolio_list plus additional detail: renewal pricing, flags, DNS configuration (nameservers, hosting, DNSSEC), marketplace metrics, and pending operations. Supports bulk lookups for up to 50 domains.

domains.description: Array of domain names to get info for (e.g., ["example.com", "mysite.io"])

post.description: List ICANN contacts configured for the authenticated user's account. Required for DNS domain registration (.com, .org, etc.).
Create a new ICANN contact for DNS domain registration. Required for .com, .org, .net, etc.
Get the current shopping cart contents with comprehensive pricing breakdown including discounts, taxes, and credits. Optionally apply a discount code. Requires authentication.

post.summary: Add domains to cart for registration
post.description: Add one or more domains to the shopping cart for fresh registration. Returns the updated cart summary. Requires authentication.

domains.description: Array of domains to add to the cart

post.description: Add one or more marketplace-listed domains to the shopping cart. Supports both "Buy it now" (full price) and "Lease to Own" (monthly payments) purchases. Requires authentication.

name.description: Full domain name listed on marketplace (e.g., "premium.com")

leaseToOwnOptions.description: Optional lease-to-own options. Omit for immediate "Buy it now" purchase.

downPaymentPercentage.description: Down payment percentage (10-90%), required for down_payment type

domains.description: Array of marketplace-listed domains to add to cart

post.summary: Add Afternic marketplace domains to cart
post.description: Add one or more Afternic marketplace domains to the shopping cart. For domains with marketplace.source = "afternic" and marketplace.status = "registered-listed-for-sale" from search results. Requires authentication.

name.description: Full domain name from Afternic marketplace (e.g., "premium.com")

domains.description: Array of Afternic marketplace domains to add to cart

post.summary: Add Sedo marketplace domains to cart
post.description: Add one or more Sedo marketplace domains to the shopping cart. For domains with marketplace.source = "sedo" and marketplace.status = "registered-listed-for-sale" from search results. Requires authentication.

name.description: Full domain name from Sedo marketplace (e.g., "premium.com")

domains.description: Array of Sedo marketplace domains to add to cart

post.description: Add one or more domain renewals to the shopping cart. User must own the domains to renew them. Returns the updated cart summary. Requires authentication.

domains.description: Array of domains to add renewal to cart

post.description: Remove one or more items from the shopping cart by product ID. Returns the updated cart. Requires authentication.

productIds.description: Array of product IDs to remove from the cart

post.description: Get saved credit cards, account balance, and promo credits available for checkout. Requires authentication.

post.summary: Get URL to add a payment method
post.description: Get a URL to the payment management page where users can securely add a new credit card. Requires authentication.
Complete checkout for cart items using saved payment method or account balance. Requires authentication.

paymentMethodId.description: Stripe payment method ID for card payment. Required if cart total exceeds account balance.

useAccountBalance.description: Whether to apply account balance to reduce total. Defaults to true.

contactId.description: ICANN contact ID for DNS domain registration. Get IDs from ud_contacts_list. If not specified, uses the most recent contact.

post.description: Generate a checkout URL for completing the purchase in a browser. Returns the URL along with a cart summary. Requires authentication.

discountCode.description: Optional discount/promo code to include in checkout URL

post.description: List one or more domains for sale on the marketplace. Supports buy-now pricing, offers, and lease-to-own options.

priceInCents.description: Buy-now price in cents (0 for offers-only)

expiresAt.description: Listing expiration date as ISO 8601 string (e.g., "2025-12-31"). Must be 1-36500 days from now. Default: 90 days.

domainDisplayName.description: Optional human-readable domain display name used in listings

leaseToOwnOptions.description: Optional lease-to-own configuration for the domain listing

downPaymentPercentage.description: Down payment percentage (10-90), required for down_payment type

post.description: Update price, settings, or options for existing listings.

expiresAt.description: New listing expiration date as ISO 8601 string (e.g., "2025-12-31"). Must be 1-36500 days from now.

listingSettings.description: Listing-level settings such as offers and display preferences.

minOfferAmountInCents.description: Minimum offer amount (in cents) accepted for this listing.

isOfferFeatureEnabled.description: Indicates whether the offer feature is enabled for this listing.

domainDisplayName.description: Custom display name to use for this domain in marketplace contexts.

leaseToOwnOptions.description: Lease-to-own configuration options for the listing.

downPaymentPercentage.description: Down payment percentage (10-90), required for down_payment type

post.description: Cancel one or more active marketplace listings.

listingIds.description: Array of listing IDs to cancel

post.description: List incoming offers on domains you own. Filter by domain or status.
Accept or reject incoming offers on your domains.
List conversations about domains you own or are interested in. Includes buyer-seller messaging threads.

skipEmpty.description: Skip conversations with no messages (default: true)

skip.description: Number of conversations to skip (pagination offset, default: 0)

take.description: Number of conversations to return (1-100, default: 20)

post.description: Start or find an existing conversation with the seller of a domain. Returns existing conversation if one already exists.

domain.description: The domain name to inquire about (e.g., "example.crypto")

buyerId.description: Optional: Encoded buyer ID for sellers responding to offers

post.description: Get messages in a domain conversation. Messages are returned newest-first with cursor-based pagination.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for loading older messages

post.summary: Send a message in a conversation
post.description: Send a message in a domain conversation. Messages are encrypted at rest.

post.summary: List DNS records for a domain
post.description: List all DNS records for a domain in your portfolio. Supports filtering by record type and subdomain, with pagination.

type.description: Filter by record type (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS)

subName.description: Filter by subdomain ("@" for root, "www", "*" for wildcard)

post.description: Add DNS records to one or more domains. Supports A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS, SRV, and CAA record types. Bulk operations up to 50 records.

type.description: Record type (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS, SRV, CAA)

upsertMode.description: Global setting for how to handle existing records

post.description: Update existing DNS records on one or more domains. Bulk operations up to 50 records.
Remove specific DNS records by ID from one or more domains. Bulk operations up to 50 records.
Remove ALL user-created DNS records from one or more domains. Requires explicit confirmation. Bulk operations up to 50 domains.

domains.description: Array of domains to remove all records from (1-50)

confirmDeleteAll.description: Must be exactly true to confirm this destructive operation

post.description: List current nameservers and check if using UD defaults or custom nameservers.
Configure external nameservers (e.g., Cloudflare, Route 53) for one or more domains. Supports up to 50 domains per request.
Switch back to Unstoppable Domains default nameservers for one or more domains. Supports up to 50 domains per request.
List hosting/forwarding configurations (UD Profile, redirects).
Configure hosting for one or more domains: for-sale listing page, permanent redirect (301), or temporary redirect (302). Supports up to 50 domains per request.
Remove hosting/forwarding configuration from one or more domains. Supports up to 50 domains per request.

deleteAll.description: Remove ALL hosting configs for this domain

domains.description: Array of domains to remove hosting from

confirmDeleteAll.description: Must be true when any domain has deleteAll: true

post.summary: Get pending operations for multiple domains
post.description: Check status of DNS operations across multiple domains. Use to track changes and verify completion after bulk operations.

domains.description: Array of domains to check for pending operations

post.summary: Enable or disable auto renewal for ICANN DNS domains
post.description: Enable or disable auto renewal for ICANN DNS domains (.com, .net, .org, .io, etc.). When enabled, domains will be automatically renewed before expiration using the saved payment method. User must own the domains and have a valid payment method on file. Use ud_cart_get_payment_methods to retrieve available payment methods.

action.description: Action to perform: "enable" or "disable" auto renewal

domains.description: Array of domains to update auto renewal for

paymentMethodId.description: Payment method ID for enabling. Use ud_cart_get_payment_methods to retrieve available payment methods. If not provided, uses default card.

post.description: Add tags to domains in your portfolio. Creates new tags automatically if they don't exist. Supports bulk operations for up to 50 domains.

domains.description: Array of domain names to add tags to (e.g., ["example.com", "mysite.io"])

tags.description: Array of tag names to add (e.g., ["Work", "Important"]). Max 20 characters each.

post.description: Remove tags from domains in your portfolio. Supports bulk operations for up to 50 domains.

domains.description: Array of domain names to remove tags from (e.g., ["example.com", "mysite.io"])

tags.description: Array of tag names to remove (e.g., ["Work", "Old"])

post.description: Update domain flags (WHOIS privacy, transfer lock) for domains in your portfolio. Supports bulk operations for up to 50 domains.

domains.description: Array of domain names to update (e.g., ["example.com", "mysite.io"])

status.description: ENABLED = transfers allowed, DISABLED = transfers blocked
ENABLED = personal info hidden, DISABLED = personal info public

post.description: Push domains to another Unstoppable Domains user. Requires MFA (two-factor authentication) verification. The recipient must accept the transfer.

domains.description: Array of domain names to push (e.g., ["example.com", "mysite.io"])

otpCode.description: 6-digit OTP code from your authenticator app

bearerAuth.description: API key for authenticated operations. Obtain from your Unstoppable Domains account settings.

searchQuery.description: Sanitized search term (present for single query requests)

searchQueries.description: Array of search queries with metadata (present for multiple query requests)

invalidReason.description: Validation error reason (present for single query requests)

invalidCharacters.description: Invalid characters found (present for single query requests)

count.description: Number of results in this response

nextOffset.description: Offset for next page, null if no more pages

truncated.description: Whether results were truncated due to size limits

available.description: Whether the domain can be purchased through Unstoppable Domains. True for fresh registrations AND secondary market listings. False for registered domains not for sale, protected domains, invalid names, etc.

marketplace.description: Marketplace information including acquisition status and listing source.

status.description: Indicates how this domain can be acquired: "available" = fresh registration at standard/promo price; "registered-listed-for-sale" = already registered, listed on secondary market with fixed buy-now price; "registered-listed-for-offers" = already registered, listed on secondary market accepting offers (no fixed price); "registered-not-for-sale" = already registered, not listed for sale; "unavailable" = not available (protected, restricted, etc.); "invalid" = invalid domain name

source.description: Marketplace where the domain can be purchased. Present for all purchasable domains. "unstoppable_domains" = purchase through Unstoppable Domains (fresh registrations and UD marketplace listings); "sedo" = purchase through Sedo (external secondary market); "afternic" = purchase through Afternic (external secondary market).

searchQuery.description: The search term that produced this result (present in search results)

pricing.description: Pricing info. Present for purchasable domains except "registered-listed-for-offers" which have no fixed price.

amount.description: Price in cents. For fresh registrations, may include promo discount. For secondary market listings, shows the marketplace list price.

listAmount.description: List price before promo in cents (only for fresh registrations with active promo)

listFormatted.description: Formatted list price (only for fresh registrations with active promo)

purchaseUrl.description: Direct purchase URL (only for available domains)

AddListedDomainToCartResponse.description: Response for adding marketplace-listed domains to cart

AddAfternicDomainToCartResponse.description: Response for adding Afternic marketplace domains to cart

AddSedoDomainToCartResponse.description: Response for adding Sedo marketplace domains to cart

AddDomainRenewalToCartResponse.description: Response for adding domain renewals to cart

note.description: Optional note about contact selection when user has multiple contacts

url.description: URL to the payment management page

instructions.description: Guidance for the user on how to add a card

status.description: Contact status: "active" = ready for checkout, "draft" = syncing with registrar (wait a few seconds), "admin_disabled" = cannot be used

accountEmail.description: User's account email (masked) - suggest using for new contacts for auto-verification

accountEmailHint.description: Tip about automatic verification when contact email matches account email

nextPage.description: Next page number if more results exist, null otherwise

truncated.description: Whether results were truncated due to size limits

domains.description: Comprehensive info for each requested domain

found.description: Whether the domain was found in your portfolio

lifecycle.description: Domain lifecycle: dates, ownership, renewal, auto-renewal

isExternallyOwned.description: Whether domain is in registrar custody (externally owned)

isEligible.description: Whether domain is eligible for renewal

pricePerYear.description: Renewal price per year in cents (USD)

flags.description: Domain-level flags (WHOIS privacy, transfer lock, etc.)

dns.description: DNS configuration from cache (nameservers, hosting, DNSSEC)

watchlistCount.description: Number of users watching this domain

availableTags.description: All tags you've created (useful for adding tags to other domains)

expiresAt.description: Expiration date for DNS domains (ISO string)

transferStatus.description:
Domain transfer status:
 "none" - No active transfer
 "pending" - Transfer in progress

reverse.description: Whether this is set as reverse resolution

offersCount.description: Number of active offers on this domain

leadsCount.description: Number of buyer inquiries/messages about this domain

watchlistCount.description: Number of users watching this domain

listing.description: Listing details if domain is for sale

status.description:
Listing status:
 "open" - Live on marketplace, ready for purchase (user-custodied domains)
 "open-not-signed" - Live on marketplace, ready for purchase (UD-custodied domains, no user action needed)
 "open-on-request" - Accepting offers only, no fixed price
 "draft" - Not yet published
 "waiting-for-approval" - Pending wallet signature from owner
 "pending-admin-approval" - Under review (high-value listings)
 "pending" - Sale in progress
 "canceled" - Listing was canceled
Note: Both "open" and "open-not-signed" mean the listing is active and purchasable.

Auto-renewal subscription status:
 "active" - Subscription active, will auto-renew
 "pending" - Payment collected, waiting for domain registration
 "update_required" - Payment method needs updating (card expired/declined)
 "expired" - Subscription expired, domain renewal overdue
 "cancelled" - Subscription cancelled, will not auto-renew

truncated.description: Indicates if the offers list was truncated to meet response size limits

truncationMessage.description: Optional message providing details about the truncation

shortLatestMessageContent.description: Preview of latest message (truncated to 100 chars)

total.description: Total number of conversations matching filters

id.description: Record ID (may be undefined for system records)

readonly.description: Whether this record is read-only and cannot be modified

readonlyReasons.description: Reasons why the record is read-only

dnsStatus.description: Present when DNS is not managed by UD. Explains the current DNS configuration state.

configured.description: Whether nameservers are set up for this domain

provider.description: DNS provider: "ud" for UD-managed, "external" for third-party

message.description: Human-readable explanation and suggested next steps

record.description: DNS record affected by this operation, if applicable

recordId.description: Identifier of the affected DNS record, if applicable

removed.description: Indicates whether a record was removed by this operation

config.description: Additional DNS configuration details returned by the operation

hasDnssec.description: Whether DNSSEC is configured (for nameserver operations)

ttl.description: TTL value in seconds (returned by update operations)

BulkDnsOperationResponse.description: Response for bulk DNS operations (nameservers, hosting). Contains results per domain with success/failure tracking.

hasDnssec.description: Whether DNSSEC is configured (for nameserver operations)

deletedAll.description: Whether all configs were removed (for hosting remove)

isUsingDefaultNameservers.description: True if using UD default nameservers

PendingOperationsResponse.description: Bulk response for pending operations across multiple domains

hasPendingOperations.description: Whether any operations are still in progress

status.description: UserOperationStatus string, e.g. PENDING, PENDING_SIGNATURE, COMPLETED, FAILED

originOperationId.description: ID of the originating operation, if any

errorCode.description: Error code if the operation failed, otherwise null

failureCount.description: Number of domains that failed lookup

totalPendingCount.description: Total pending operations across all domains

domainsWithPending.description: List of domain names with pending operations

tagsApplied.description: Tags that were applied to this domain

newTagsCreated.description: Tags that were newly created (didn't exist before)

successCount.description: Number of domains with tags applied

tagsRemoved.description: Tags that were removed from this domain

successCount.description: Number of domains with tags removed

updatedFlags.description: Flags that were updated for this domain

successCount.description: Number of domains with flags updated

success.description: Whether any domains were successfully pushed

pushedDomains.description: Domains that were successfully initiated for push

reason.description: Reason the domain could not be pushed

failedDomains.description: Domains that could not be pushed with reasons

tags.name: Contacts
tags.description: Manage ICANN contacts for DNS domain registration (requires authentication)

tags.name: Cart
tags.description: Shopping cart management, payment methods, and checkout (requires authentication)

tags.name: Marketplace
tags.description: List domains for sale, manage listings, and handle offers (requires authentication)

tags.name: Leads
tags.description: Domain conversations and messaging between buyers and sellers (requires authentication)

tags.name: DNS Management
tags.description: Manage DNS records, nameservers, and hosting configurations for owned domains (requires authentication)

tags.name: Domain Management
tags.description: Manage domain settings like auto renewal (requires authentication)
